channel.title: How to add specials to customs?
channel.description:
Recently switched base to woeshi scape and noticed all the customs dont have specials
can anyone help?

item.title: How to add specials to customs?
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

h3llk03r:

Im having the same problem D:

sucks doesnt it… Comon any badass coders out there that can help us put in the bar and specials[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 13, 2009, 02:56:50 pm[/size][hr]Please someone :((((

item.title: How to add specials to customs?
item.dc:creator: @skinzoskinz skinzoskinz
item.description:
@skinzoskinz wrote:

[quote=“Beastly¿, post:2, topic:294983”]You have to add the special I think in player.java or playerhandler.java, depends though. Then you need the Gfx for the special for your custom.

I don’t know the code for adding specials to a custom, but try asking someone else.[/quote]

well err it doesnt even have a bar… can anyone help?

Read full topic

item.title: How to add specials to customs?
item.dc:creator: @Beastly1 Beastly¿
item.description:
@Beastly1 wrote:

You have to add the special I think in player.java or playerhandler.java, depends though. Then you need the Gfx for the special for your custom.

I don’t know the code for adding specials to a custom, but try asking someone else.

Read full topic
